title: Fomu
subtitle: Session 2
description:
Fomu, the FPGA in your USB Port

This workshop will be given multiple times (all sessions are identical). [https://workshop.fomu.im The workshop] is self guided with helpers for when you get stuck. Please sign up on the paper at the [[Assembly:Hardware Hacking Area|Hardware Hacking Area!]]

Come get an FPGA dev board in your USB port and start hacking! Getting the toolchain set up and working will earn you a free Fomu from [[User:Mithro|Tim 'mithro' Ansell]] (while stocks last).

''(This is one of many cool things happening throughout 36C3 in the huge '''[[Assembly:Hardware Hacking Area|Hardware Hacking Area!]]''')''
